content.p: Digital Support Start your induction and get ready for when you start. Need help? Ask our dedicated IT tutors for support Experiencing technical problems? Our team are on hand to get you back up and running How we can help Software, Equipment, and university systems Complete a form to log an IT fault or request Check the status of your enquiries For students and staff Open Monday - Friday, 8am - 5pm Call us on 0115 95 16677 Ask our team a quick question or arrange an on-site visit IT accounts, Laptops, Mobile phones, Email, Software, System access, Microsoft 365 Community Q+A Quick response via Microsoft Teams For students Technical support with IT and AV equipment Purchasing technical equipment Book an appointment for on-site assistance For staff Loan a laptop for 30 days free of charge Software and hardware repairs for personal devices Advice on resolving technical issues If your query relates to any of the below, please contact the relevant department:
